description: Pre-industrial climate and 286ppm CO₂ concentration. The climate data for the entire period (1661-2299) are unique – no (or little) recycling of data has taken place.
Future climate and CO₂ concentration from RCP2.6.
Future climate and CO₂ concentration from RCP8.5.
CO₂ concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.
